      • addField

        public void addField(Field inputField)
        Adds a field to the database if it is not already present.
        Parameters:
        inputField - Field object to add to the database.

      • getFields

        public java.util.List<Field> getFields(int projectID)
        Gets the list of all fields coresponding to a project iD
        Parameters:
        projectID - The project whose ID we are looking for.
        Returns:
        A list containing object versions of all the fields corresponding to the projects in our database.

      • getField

        public Field getField(int fieldID)
        Searches the database for a specific field
        Parameters:
        fieldID - Field to search for.
        Returns:
        the field indicated by the input as an object or null if it cannot be found.
